T02D1442:242a-1: shr'i badzra d'a ka sya sto tra danda ka n'a ma /
T02D1442:242a-3: dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i bstod pa rgyun chags zhes bya ba /
T02D1442:242a-4: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1442:242a-5: autpala mdog sngon char sprin phreng ba dri med nam
T02D1442:242a-6: mkha' sngon po'i mchog rlung chen me chu sa yi
T02D1442:242a-7: dkyil 'khor steng du gnas pa'i gser gyi ri bo'i
T02D1442:242a-8: steng na padma rgyas pa'i gdan gnas dbang phyug mnan
T02D1442:242a-9: cing dkar mo'i nu ma gnyis po mnyam brdzis zil
T02D1442:242a-10: gyis dbang po nye dbang nya mi zla ba la
T02D1442:242a-11: sogs lha rnams bsngags mdzad lha min du ma skrag
T02D1442:242a-12: par mdzad cing 'jig rten bsrung mdzad dogs pa kun
T02D1442:242a-13: 'phrogs stag lpags na bzas bkab mdzad ngan bsgral brtan
T02D1442:242a-14: zhing zab pa'i yi ge h'um dang phat kyi rnam
T02D1442:242a-15: pa h'a h'a'i nga ro nam mkha' kun gang sna
T02D1442:242a-16: tshogs rdo rje zla phyed kyis mtshan gtsug tor dam
T02D1442:242a-17: pa gti mug mun bcom legs bar sgrol ba dung
T02D1442:242a-18: chen phreng ba'i bar ba'i rdo rje sgrar bcas dril
T02D1442:242a-19: bu rab gsal dam pa'i phyag rgya nye bar 'khyud
T02D1442:242a-20: pa gnyis med ye shes chags pa'i yan lag rang
T02D1442:242a-21: bzhin btsun mo'i grogs dang ldan pa phyag gnyis glang
T02D1442:242b-0: chen myos pa chen @242b po'i pags pa'i na bza'
T02D1442:242b-1: bsnams pas brel zhing rnam par 'phro ba'i dgra sta
T02D1442:242b-2: mdud rno gri gug 'bar ba'i rdo rje kha tv'am
T02D1442:242b-3: ga dang zhags pa 'phro ba tshangs ba'i mgo dang
T02D1442:242b-4: cang te'u dang ni thod pa 'phro ba'i phyag rnams
T02D1442:242b-5: kyis mdzes sha dang tshil bu chen po gsol ba
T02D1442:242b-6: bsam gtan ldan pa cod pan ldan pa ye shes
T02D1442:242b-7: ldan pa blo nor ldan pa bcu drug phyed phyed
T02D1442:242b-8: zhal dang ldan pa spyan gsum dag par mdzad pa
T02D1442:242b-9: mi mgo'i phreng bas brgyan pa 'jigs su rung ba
T02D1442:242b-10: drag po mi bzad 'khor ba'i dgon pa yang dag
T02D1442:242b-11: sgrol ba bdud rnams 'joms pa rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D1442:242b-13: / de yi rjes su phyogs kyi padma'i 'dab ma
T02D1442:242b-14: bzhir bzhugs mkha' 'gro chen mo l'a ma dum skyes
T02D1442:242b-15: gzugs can ma ni yid 'phrog byed ma rnams dang
T02D1442:242b-16: ldan zhing mtshams su kun gnas thod pas bskor cing
T02D1442:242b-17: de nas sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lor bzhugs shing
T02D1442:242b-18: sa 'og sa steng mtho ris spyod pa de nyid
T02D1442:242b-19: gsum las khros pa dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug
T02D1442:242b-20: 'khor lo dam pa 'khor lo can ni phyogs dang
T02D1442:242b-21: phyogs min dag na gnas pa'i khva gdong la sogs
T02D1442:242b-22: lha mo brgyad kyis mngon par mchod cing rang gi
T02D1442:242b-23: lha mos mnyam par sbyar ba'i sgeg pa dang ldan
T02D1442:242b-24: bdud kyi sde rnams sngangs par mdzad pa rnam par
T02D1442:242b-25: 'phro ba sems can la ni yang dag chags can
T02D1442:242b-26: sdang la rnam sdang khro la kun khro nyon mongs
T02D1442:242b-27: rnams 'joms 'chi bdag bdud sogs khrag dron btung bas
T02D1442:242b-28: tshim pa'i thugs bde 'jig rten gsum na mdzad pa
T02D1442:242b-29: gcig bzhugs sangs rgyas mdzad brtson rdo rje lha mo'i
T02D1442:242b-30: bde ba reg pa las skyes pa sbu langs pa'i
T02D1442:242b-31: tshogs kyis khyab pa'i sku can spyan gyi rdzi ma
T02D1442:242b-32: g-yo zhing mgur gyi sbubs nas sid kyi sgrar bcas
T02D1442:242b-33: bzhad cing yid 'ong phyag gi zhags pas mgul 'khyud
T02D1442:242b-34: nu ma gnyis rgyas mkhrang rten las byung rdul gyi
T02D1442:242b-35: thigs pa'i tshogs kyis mchod cing nyi ma bye ba'i
T02D1442:242b-36: 'od kyi snang bas phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs
T02D1442:242b-37: khyab cing snyan chas brgyan pa zla ba gzhon nu
T02D1442:242b-38: phyed pa'i mche ba'i myu gu lham me dpal mdzad
T02D1442:242b-39: blo mdzad tshim pa ster zhing rgyas ba ster ba
T02D1442:242b-40: rgyal srid ster zhing dngos grub ster ba phun sum
T02D1442:242b-41: tshogs ba thams cad rab ster 'dren pa rdo rje
T02D1442:242b-44: // / dpe med thugs rje'i nyams kyis 'jug pa de
T02D1442:243a-0: bzhin gshegs pa'i bkod pa ma lus rnam @243a *
T02D1442:243a-1: // par 'phro bas 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mi bzad
T02D1442:243a-2: nang song nyon mongs rba rlabs 'phro ba'i phreng ba
T02D1442:243a-3: rnam par 'joms mdzad me 'bar stong pas lhag pa'i
T02D1442:243a-4: 'od 'bar glog 'phro'i 'od gsal ye shes phung po'i
T02D1442:243a-5: 'od zer khyab par yang dag bstan cing mtha' yas
T02D1442:243a-6: dngos po'i rang bzhin dngos bral dngos med ngo bo
T02D1442:243a-7: yang dag las byung ngo bo khams gsum rang bzhin
T02D1442:243a-8: gzugs bzang gzugs bral ma lus gzugs bcom tshangs pa'i
T02D1442:243a-9: gnas bzhis nges par gnas pa mtshan gyis brgyan pa
T02D1442:243a-10: dpe byad rnams kyis legs par spras pa chos dang
T02D1442:243a-11: longs spyod rdzogs pa sprul pa'i sku gsum po yis
T02D1442:243a-12: khyab pa'i sems can don gyi phrin las de nyid
T02D1442:243a-13: gsum pa chags la chags che ma rungs pa la
T02D1442:243a-14: zhe sdang chen po rmongs la rmongs chen 'ded la
T02D1442:243a-15: 'dod chen brtse ba stong nyid tha dad med pa
T02D1442:243a-16: sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' ni spangs shing 'jig rten
T02D1442:243a-17: gsum po skad cig gis khyab rnam bar shes pa
T02D1442:243a-18: mngon du gyur pa dga' ba chen po'i tshogs kyi
T02D1442:243a-19: mchog mdzes sbyin dang tshul khrims la sogs yongs dag
T02D1442:243a-20: phyi nang mun pa mi bzad brgal zhing 'gro ba'i
T02D1442:243a-21: mdzad pa byed pa 'phrog byed 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa
T02D1442:243a-22: yang dag sgrol mdzad nyon mongs nyon mongs kun 'phrog
T02D1442:243a-23: gzugs dang ldan zhing gzugs kun sdud mdzad gdug pa
T02D1442:243a-24: kun nas skrag par mdzad cing phra mo'i sku chen
T02D1442:243a-25: spom po'i lus chen khyab bdag khyab pa rtag pa
T02D1442:243a-26: skad cig gnas pa brtan pa g-yo ba gsal ba
T02D1442:243a-27: dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug 'jig rten dbang phyug
T02D1442:243a-28: la ni dngos po kun gyis 'dud /
T02D1442:243a-30: // / ro brgyas spras shing rmad byung 'jigs rungs du
T02D1442:243a-31: ma'i gzugs can ro pa sregs me drag mi mgo
T02D1442:243a-32: rab gtum rus pa dum bu'i tshogs dang skra sogs
T02D1442:243a-33: kyis brgyan bsreg bzhin pa yi yan lag mchog gi
T02D1442:243a-34: klad pa lug cing rkang mar zhag 'thor 'dam ni
T02D1442:243a-35: 'dred pa skra chad pa dang rgyu ma'i phreng ba
T02D1442:243a-36: lang long nar ba mkha' 'gro ma dang 'byung po
T02D1442:243a-37: ro langs ha ha'i nga ro mthon por sgrogs shing
T02D1442:243a-38: sgrub pa po ni du ma h'um yig gis bsdigs
T02D1442:243a-39: rgyu zhing ce sbyang phat kyi rnam pa'i ku co
T02D1442:243a-40: 'don cing lag bteg gar byed keng rus phreng ba
T02D1442:243a-41: 'khrigs pa dpa' bo'i btung ba'i spro ba las byung
T02D1442:243a-42: dga' ba dang bcas glu snyan len cing gar byed
T02D1442:243b-0: @243b g-yo zhing rol pa rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma
T02D1442:243b-1: yi dbang phyug tshogs pa bya rgod mchu yis gnon
T02D1442:243b-2: cing bcad pa'i lus kyi khrag gi rgyun 'dzag mun
T02D1442:243b-3: nag can ni ce sbyang gdong las byung ba'i 'bar
T02D1442:243b-4: ba drag po me 'bar tshogs can bdud sde'i tshogs
T02D1442:243b-5: med nag po dus chen 'khrigs pa'i lha rdzas dur
T02D1442:243b-6: khrod brgya da du gar mdzad bla ma he ru
T02D1442:243b-7: ka la bdag gis ngag rnams kyis ni mngon par
T02D1442:243b-8: mchod pa'i bsod nams nam mkha'i khams kyi khongs khyab
T02D1442:243b-9: rab skyes 'di yis skye ba 'di rnams nyon mongs
T02D1442:243b-10: dra ba ma lus spangs nas mnyam med bsod nams
T02D1442:243b-11: phung po bsags nas rab skyes dri med ye shes
T02D1442:243b-12: tshogs ni mngon gyur rang rig yang dag gsal ba
T02D1442:243b-13: dam pa'i 'od kyis gsal byas sna tshogs du ma'i
T02D1442:243b-14: ga'i mug mun nag mtha' yas kun nas bsal ba'i
T02D1442:243b-15: skad cig la ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro rdzogs pa'i
T02D1442:243b-16: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku bzhin kun nas rtag tu
T02D1442:243b-18: / dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i bstod pa rgyun chags
T02D1442:243b-19: zhes bya ba rtog ge ba'i tshogs kyi gtsug gi
T02D1442:243b-20: nor bu slob dpon chen po dpal ldan chos kyi
T02D1442:243b-21: grags pa'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1442:243b-23: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ma ni ka shr'i
T02D1442:243b-24: dzny'a na'i zhal snga nas chag lo ts'a ba sh'akya'i
T02D1442:243b-25: dge slong dpal gyi mtha' can gyis bsgyur cing zhus
T02D1442:243b-27: 'di'i gzhung tshad ni bla ma'i phyag dpe la tshig
T02D1442:243b-28: rkang pa bzhi'i re re zhing yi ge sum cu
T02D1442:243b-29: rtsa drug du gnas shing rkang pa bzhi ka bsdoms
T02D1442:243b-30: pas yi ge stong sum brgya bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi
T02D1442:243b-31: bzhugs so // bod kyi dpe la ni tshig rkang
T02D1442:243b-32: re re la tsheg par nyis brgya dgu bcu rtsa
